<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 418, 228, 434]]<|/det|>
## INSTRUCTIONS  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 435, 855, 621]]<|/det|>
INSTRUCTIONS- Answer all questions.- Use a black or dark blue pen. You may use an HB pencil for any diagrams or graphs.- Write your name, centre number and candidate number in the boxes at the top of the page.- Write your answer to each question in the space provided.- Do not use an erasable pen or correction fluid.- Do not write on any bar codes.- You should use a calculator where appropriate.- You may use tracing paper.- You must show all necessary working clearly.- Give non-exact numerical answers correct to 3 significant figures, or 1 decimal place for angles in degrees, unless a different level of accuracy is specified in the question.- For \(\pi\), use either your calculator value or 3.142.  

<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 650, 219, 665]]<|/det|>
## INFORMATION  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 666, 730, 698]]<|/det|>
INFORMATION- The total mark for this paper is 130.- The number of marks for each question or part question is shown in brackets [ ].

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[77, 72, 96, 89]]<|/det|> <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 72, 146, 89]]<|/det|> <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 71, 722, 91]]<|/det|> Here are the ingredients needed to make a pasta bake to serve 12 people. <|ref|>table<|/ref|><|det|>[[388, 101, 609, 273]]<|/det|>

600 g pasta
460 g mushrooms

___________________________ % [1] <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[148, 432, 180, 451]]<|/det|> <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[191, 432, 755, 451]]<|/det|> Find the mass of butter needed to make a pasta bake to serve 18 people. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[640, 555, 920, 574]]<|/det|> ___________________________ g [2] <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[144, 586, 180, 604]]<|/det|> <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[191, 586, 700, 604]]<|/det|> Monica has 2.2 litres of milk and \(1.5\mathrm{kg}\) of each other ingredient. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[193, 616, 745, 636]]<|/det|> Calculate the greatest number of people she can serve with pasta bake. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[640, 871, 922, 890]]<|/det|> ___________________________ [3]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 630, 719, 650]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[118, 237, 576, 257]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[118, 266, 450, 285]]<|/det|>
The trough is completely filled with water.
